properties.name: spring.h2.console.access-matcher
properties.description: The ant-accessMatcher declaring the access rules for the h2-web-console.

properties.name: application.authentication.signature-algorithm
properties.description: The signature algorithm to use for signing tokens, defaults to HS256.

properties.name: application.authentication.secret
properties.description: The secret used to sign the authentication token.

properties.name: application.authentication.validity-duration
properties.description: The duration in seconds for which an authentication token is valid, defaults to 600.

properties.name: application.authentication.overlap-duration
properties.description: The duration in seconds for which the new and the old authentication token are both valid, defaults to 300.
